The two missiles hit with dire precision. Sanguine's few solid parts 
explode and she is no more. She died happily, knowing she had avenged 
Tarantulas...

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Firaxis::
>        "NOOOOOOOOOOOO!  METEARA!"  He flies down to her side lifting 
up her 
> head and holding it as she dies.  His eyes flash red as he glares 
around with 
> utter hatred and determination.  "First I will avenge you.  Then 
they shall 
> all leave this world.  This is my solemn promise m'lady."  He gently 
lays her 
> head back on the ground and stands up.  He glances around quickly 
finally 
> spotting the one she had been fighting with unconscious not far 
away.  He 
> walks over to Sanguine's body and stands over her.  He glares at her 
> unconscious form.
> 
>        "It's too bad I won't get to hear you scream."  He fires a 
concussion 
> missiles directly at her body, the shockwave sending him flying back 
through 
> the air into the trees.  When he recovers he flies into the air 
above the 
> battlefield.  He fires another concussion missile overhead only this 
time it 
> is tinted with bright red to get the attention of those below him.  
He raises 
> his voice so that it can be heard by all on the battlefield above 
the weapons 
> fire.  "ATTENTION CYBERTRONIANS!  THIS IS YOUR NOTICE!  YOU ARE 
HEREBY 
> EVICTED FROM THIS PLANET!  ANY WHO DO NOT COMPLY WILL BE PROSECUTED 
TO THE 
> FULLEST EXTENT OF MY LAW!  IN THIS CASE THAT IS A DEATH SENTENCE!"
